source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: 9 Pencil Animal Pack - Learn How To Draw for Beginners
items.headline: No Free-Hand Drawing Required. Learn to draw AMAZING Animals using only 9 Pastel Pencils. Follow Step by Step Videos.
objectives_summary: How to Draw 3 Animals with just 9 Pencils
The light to dark rule when layering pastel colours
How to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: How to Draw Lions, Tigers and Bears using Pastel Pencils
items.headline: Learn how to draw three stunning animal pictures using Pastel Pencils - an easy to pick up art medium that anyone can do
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw Lions, Tigers and Bears!
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: Beginner Oil Painting: Paint anything you want simple & easy
items.headline: A solid foundation for beginners that will set you up for faster progress and success.
objectives_summary: Oil painting basics and materials
How values work and why they are important to represent things realistically
Making (and mixing) a grayscale

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Waterfall and blooming - Landscape

visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina
visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova

items.headline: We learn how to paint the Summer fields Landscape step-by-step!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint landscape: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, detailing, dry brush, shaped brushes using
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: The Art of Portrait Drawing: Drawing with Charcoal Pencil

visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist
visible_instructors.name: Homa
visible_instructors.title: Homa Tayefeh

visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist
visible_instructors.name: Matin
visible_instructors.title: Matin Shafiei

items.headline: Learn How to Drawing Realistic Portrait with Conte and Charcoal Pencil. Pencil Drawing is a Cool Art. Realistic Man Face
objectives_summary: Get acquainted with the material of Conte and charcoal and be able to perform simple faces with smooth and textureless skin
How to draw each of face components with charcoal technique
Ability to create volume, creating hair and beard, the shape of glasses and create transparency of glass and the shapes reflecting on it

items.title: Fabric Painting: Paint on any type of fabric
items.headline: Learn to sketch, paint and do hand embroidery on all different fabrics of your choice, from natural to synthetic ones.
objectives_summary: Sketch, paint or embroidery on any types of fabric of your choice from natural to synthetic ones.
Assemble the stretcher frame, how to stretch the fabric onto the frame.
Create your designs on fabric.

items.title: Landscape Drawing, How to Draw Pine Trees
items.headline: Great Drawing Comes from Learning and Understanding. Anyone Can Learn to Draw! Learn to Draw Pine Trees
objectives_summary: Basic Tree Structures and Textures
Rendering Form and Detail
Designing the Contour and Shape to Look Correct

items.title: Drawing Mastery: From Basics to Advanced Techniques

visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist, Sculptor, Illustrator, and Engineer
visible_instructors.name: Mandar
visible_instructors.title: Mandar Marathe

items.headline: Learn drawing basics, perspective, measuring, drawing techniques and accuracy checking techniques!
objectives_summary: Know the fundamentals for a good drawing.
Techniques to take linear and angular measurements.
Perspective techniques to add depth to drawings.

items.title: How to do Arabic calligraphy
items.headline: Arabic handlettering for beginners
objectives_summary: Hand lettering
arabic calligraphy
color theory

items.title: Beginning Watercolor: Painting a Dog
items.headline: Guided instruction of Basic Watercolor Techniques and Painting a Realistic Dog.
objectives_summary: Learn Watercolor Basics - From Materials and Set Up to Beginning Painting Techniques
Quick Tracing Techniques for Basic Drawing
Values: the Key to All Successful Paintings

items.title: Warli Tribal Art and Design
items.headline: Warli Tribal Art and Design
objectives_summary: You will learn about "Warli Art" which is an indigenous tribal art.

items.title: Landscape Drawing, How to Draw Rocks
items.headline: Great Drawing Comes from Learning and Understanding. Anyone Can Learn to Draw!
objectives_summary: Fundamentals of Drawing Rocks
Rendering Form and Detail
Light and Shadow Patterns for Clarity

items.title: Build and Fly Your Own RC Model Airplane
items.headline: Make a radio controlled airplane and fly it from scratch
objectives_summary: Build an RC airplane from scratch
Learn to prepare the model aircraft for it's flight
You'll fly your own creation

items.title: Rubik's cube Inside 3 Minutes
items.headline: Imagine amazing your friends by consistently solving Rubik's cube in under 3 minutes. Be the life and soul of the party!
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will have solved your Rubik's cube
You will know that with a bit of learning the moves, you will be able to solve any Rubik's cube you come across in future
You'll be inspired to practise, so as to be confident of solving a Rubik's cube inside 3 minutes. Every time!

items.title: Complete Trees Drawing Course
items.headline: Trees drawing fundamentals and step-by-step videos of drawing process with downloadable files for each sections
objectives_summary: Tree Drawing Fundamentals
Exercise different sketching techniques
Make better drawings with realistic trees

items.title: Byzantine Iconography Series 4: Drawing the Full Figure (P3)
items.headline: Laying the Foundations for Byzantine Iconography
objectives_summary: Students will learn to draw the garments of Imperial Saints, Martyrs and Holy Unmercenaries in frontal poses.
Basic rules of composition for drawing an icon with two figures.
